txt.en:
A woman in a grey cloak wipes her blade against the fur of the slain sekbir.

'You see, it is one thing to fight a person either on a killing field or in a duel. It is another thing entirely to fight a beast that is twice as large as you, three times as heavy, and cares not for how good your form is. You cannot intimidate it with fancy bladework, nor trick it, not unless you possess some sorcery of which I am unaware.'

A woman in tattered armour and threadbare boots shakes her head. 'Just me and my blade. No special tricks here.'

Grey Cloak inclines her head towards a particularly nasty looking creature. 'I believe that is the strongest of them here. Do you think you can take it down?'

Threadbare Boots grins and slashes through the air a few times, warming up her wrist. 'After watching you, I think I know just what to do.'
A fierce sekbir stands above the rest.\n\nDefeat the sekbir brute in Ghar Jâdam.
Fearsome beasts roam along a part of Halrax's northern coast.
A fierce sekbir stands above the rest.
